00060                 class Point64
00061                 {
00062                         public:
00063                                 btInt64_t x;
00064                                 btInt64_t y;
00065                                 btInt64_t z;
00066                                 
00067                                 Point64(btInt64_t x, btInt64_t y, btInt64_t z): x(x), y(y), z(z)
00068                                 {
00069                                 }
00070 
00071                                 bool isZero()
00072                                 {
00073                                         return (x == 0) && (y == 0) && (z == 0);
00074                                 }
00075 
00076                                 btInt64_t dot(const Point64& b) const
00077                                 {
00078                                         return x * b.x + y * b.y + z * b.z;
00079                                 }
00080                 };
00081                 
00082                 class Point32
00083                 {
00084                         public:
00085                                 btInt32_t x;
00086                                 btInt32_t y;
00087                                 btInt32_t z;
00088                                 int index;
00089                                 
00090                                 Point32()
00091                                 {
00092                                 }
00093                                 
00094                                 Point32(btInt32_t x, btInt32_t y, btInt32_t z): x(x), y(y), z(z), index(-1)
00095                                 {
00096                                 }
00097                                 
00098                                 bool operator==(const Point32& b) const
00099                                 {
00100                                         return (x == b.x) && (y == b.y) && (z == b.z);
00101                                 }
00102 
00103                                 bool operator!=(const Point32& b) const
00104                                 {
00105                                         return (x != b.x) || (y != b.y) || (z != b.z);
00106                                 }
00107 
00108                                 bool isZero()
00109                                 {
00110                                         return (x == 0) && (y == 0) && (z == 0);
00111                                 }
00112 
00113                                 Point64 cross(const Point32& b) const
00114                                 {
00115                                         return Point64(y * b.z - z * b.y, z * b.x - x * b.z, x * b.y - y * b.x);
00116                                 }
00117 
00118                                 Point64 cross(const Point64& b) const
00119                                 {
00120                                         return Point64(y * b.z - z * b.y, z * b.x - x * b.z, x * b.y - y * b.x);
00121                                 }
00122 
00123                                 btInt64_t dot(const Point32& b) const
00124                                 {
00125                                         return x * b.x + y * b.y + z * b.z;
00126                                 }
00127 
00128                                 btInt64_t dot(const Point64& b) const
00129                                 {
00130                                         return x * b.x + y * b.y + z * b.z;
00131                                 }
00132 
00133                                 Point32 operator+(const Point32& b) const
00134                                 {
00135                                         return Point32(x + b.x, y + b.y, z + b.z);
00136                                 }
00137 
00138                                 Point32 operator-(const Point32& b) const
00139                                 {
00140                                         return Point32(x - b.x, y - b.y, z - b.z);
00141                                 }
00142                 };

00144                 class Int128
00145                 {
00146                         public:
00147                                 btUint64_t low;
00148                                 btUint64_t high;
00149 
00150                                 Int128()
00151                                 {
00152                                 }
00153 
00154                                 Int128(btUint64_t low, btUint64_t high): low(low), high(high)
00155                                 {
00156                                 }
00157 
00158                                 Int128(btUint64_t low): low(low), high(0)
00159                                 {
00160                                 }
00161 
00162                                 Int128(btInt64_t value): low(value), high((value >= 0) ? 0 : (btUint64_t) -1LL)
00163                                 {
00164                                 }
00165 
00166                                 static Int128 mul(btInt64_t a, btInt64_t b);
00167 
00168                                 static Int128 mul(btUint64_t a, btUint64_t b);
00169 
00170                                 Int128 operator-() const
00171                                 {
00172                                         return Int128((btUint64_t) -(btInt64_t)low, ~high + (low == 0));
00173                                 }
00174 
00175                                 Int128 operator+(const Int128& b) const
00176                                 {
00177 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00178                                         Int128 result;
00179                                         __asm__ ("addq %[bl], %[rl]\n\t"
00180                                                                          "adcq %[bh], %[rh]\n\t"
00181                                                                          : [rl] "=r" (result.low), [rh] "=r" (result.high)
00182                                                                          : "0"(low), "1"(high), [bl] "g"(b.low), [bh] "g"(b.high)
00183                                                                          : "cc" );
00184                                         return result;
00185 #else
00186                                         btUint64_t lo = low + b.low;
00187                                         return Int128(lo, high + b.high + (lo < low));
00188 #endif
00189                                 }
00190 
00191                                 Int128 operator-(const Int128& b) const
00192                                 {
00193 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00194                                         Int128 result;
00195                                         __asm__ ("subq %[bl], %[rl]\n\t"
00196                                                                          "sbbq %[bh], %[rh]\n\t"
00197                                                                          : [rl] "=r" (result.low), [rh] "=r" (result.high)
00198                                                                          : "0"(low), "1"(high), [bl] "g"(b.low), [bh] "g"(b.high)
00199                                                                          : "cc" );
00200                                         return result;
00201 #else
00202                                         return *this + -b;
00203 #endif
00204                                 }
00205 
00206                                 Int128& operator+=(const Int128& b)
00207                                 {
00208 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00209                                         __asm__ ("addq %[bl], %[rl]\n\t"
00210                                                                          "adcq %[bh], %[rh]\n\t"
00211                                                                          : [rl] "=r" (low), [rh] "=r" (high)
00212                                                                          : "0"(low), "1"(high), [bl] "g"(b.low), [bh] "g"(b.high)
00213                                                                          : "cc" );
00214 #else
00215                                         btUint64_t lo = low + b.low;
00216                                         if (lo < low)
00217                                         {
00218                                                 ++high;
00219                                         }
00220                                         low = lo;
00221                                         high += b.high;
00222 #endif
00223                                         return *this;
00224                                 }
00225 
00226                                 Int128& operator++()
00227                                 {
00228                                         if (++low == 0)
00229                                         {
00230                                                 ++high;
00231                                         }
00232                                         return *this;
00233                                 }
00234 
00235                                 Int128 operator*(btInt64_t b) const;
00236 
00237                                 b3Scalar toScalar() const
00238                                 {
00239                                         return ((btInt64_t) high >= 0) ? b3Scalar(high) * (b3Scalar(0x100000000LL) * b3Scalar(0x100000000LL)) + b3Scalar(low)
00240                                                 : -(-*this).toScalar();
00241                                 }
00242 
00243                                 int getSign() const
00244                                 {
00245                                         return ((btInt64_t) high < 0) ? -1 : (high || low) ? 1 : 0;
00246                                 }
00247 
00248                                 bool operator<(const Int128& b) const
00249                                 {
00250                                         return (high < b.high) || ((high == b.high) && (low < b.low));
00251                                 }
00252 
00253                                 int ucmp(const Int128&b) const
00254                                 {
00255                                         if (high < b.high)
00256                                         {
00257                                                 return -1;
00258                                         }
00259                                         if (high > b.high)
00260                                         {
00261                                                 return 1;
00262                                         }
00263                                         if (low < b.low)
00264                                         {
00265                                                 return -1;
00266                                         }
00267                                         if (low > b.low)
00268                                         {
00269                                                 return 1;
00270                                         }
00271                                         return 0;
00272                                 }
00273                 };

00276                 class Rational64
00277                 {
00278                         private:
00279                                 btUint64_t m_numerator;
00280                                 btUint64_t m_denominator;
00281                                 int sign;
00282                                 
00283                         public:
00284                                 Rational64(btInt64_t numerator, btInt64_t denominator)
00285                                 {
00286                                         if (numerator > 0)
00287                                         {
00288                                                 sign = 1;
00289                                                 m_numerator = (btUint64_t) numerator;
00290                                         }
00291                                         else if (numerator < 0)
00292                                         {
00293                                                 sign = -1;
00294                                                 m_numerator = (btUint64_t) -numerator;
00295                                         }
00296                                         else
00297                                         {
00298                                                 sign = 0;
00299                                                 m_numerator = 0;
00300                                         }
00301                                         if (denominator > 0)
00302                                         {
00303                                                 m_denominator = (btUint64_t) denominator;
00304                                         }
00305                                         else if (denominator < 0)
00306                                         {
00307                                                 sign = -sign;
00308                                                 m_denominator = (btUint64_t) -denominator;
00309                                         }
00310                                         else
00311                                         {
00312                                                 m_denominator = 0;
00313                                         }
00314                                 }
00315                                 
00316                                 bool isNegativeInfinity() const
00317                                 {
00318                                         return (sign < 0) && (m_denominator == 0);
00319                                 }
00320                                 
00321                                 bool isNaN() const
00322                                 {
00323                                         return (sign == 0) && (m_denominator == 0);
00324                                 }
00325                                 
00326                                 int compare(const Rational64& b) const;
00327                                 
00328                                 b3Scalar toScalar() const
00329                                 {
00330                                         return sign * ((m_denominator == 0) ? B3_INFINITY : (b3Scalar) m_numerator / m_denominator);
00331                                 }
00332                 };

00335                 class Rational128
00336                 {
00337                         private:
00338                                 Int128 numerator;
00339                                 Int128 denominator;
00340                                 int sign;
00341                                 bool isInt64;
00342 
00343                         public:
00344                                 Rational128(btInt64_t value)
00345                                 {
00346                                         if (value > 0)
00347                                         {
00348                                                 sign = 1;
00349                                                 this->numerator = value;
00350                                         }
00351                                         else if (value < 0)
00352                                         {
00353                                                 sign = -1;
00354                                                 this->numerator = -value;
00355                                         }
00356                                         else
00357                                         {
00358                                                 sign = 0;
00359                                                 this->numerator = (btUint64_t) 0;
00360                                         }
00361                                         this->denominator = (btUint64_t) 1;
00362                                         isInt64 = true;
00363                                 }
00364 
00365                                 Rational128(const Int128& numerator, const Int128& denominator)
00366                                 {
00367                                         sign = numerator.getSign();
00368                                         if (sign >= 0)
00369                                         {
00370                                                 this->numerator = numerator;
00371                                         }
00372                                         else
00373                                         {
00374                                                 this->numerator = -numerator;
00375                                         }
00376                                         int dsign = denominator.getSign();
00377                                         if (dsign >= 0)
00378                                         {
00379                                                 this->denominator = denominator;
00380                                         }
00381                                         else
00382                                         {
00383                                                 sign = -sign;
00384                                                 this->denominator = -denominator;
00385                                         }
00386                                         isInt64 = false;
00387                                 }
00388 
00389                                 int compare(const Rational128& b) const;
00390 
00391                                 int compare(btInt64_t b) const;
00392 
00393                                 b3Scalar toScalar() const
00394                                 {
00395                                         return sign * ((denominator.getSign() == 0) ? B3_INFINITY : numerator.toScalar() / denominator.toScalar());
00396                                 }
00397                 };

00435                 class Vertex
00436                 {
00437                         public:
00438                                 Vertex* next;
00439                                 Vertex* prev;
00440                                 Edge* edges;
00441                                 Face* firstNearbyFace;
00442                                 Face* lastNearbyFace;
00443                                 PointR128 point128;
00444                                 Point32 point;
00445                                 int copy;
00446                                 
00447                                 Vertex(): next(NULL), prev(NULL), edges(NULL), firstNearbyFace(NULL), lastNearbyFace(NULL), copy(-1)
00448                                 {
00449                                 }
00450 
00451 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
00452                                 void print()
00453                                 {
00454                                         b3Printf("V%d (%d, %d, %d)", point.index, point.x, point.y, point.z);
00455                                 }
00456 
00457                                 void printGraph();
00458 #endif
00459 
00460                                 Point32 operator-(const Vertex& b) const
00461                                 {
00462                                         return point - b.point;
00463                                 }
00464 
00465                                 Rational128 dot(const Point64& b) const
00466                                 {
00467                                         return (point.index >= 0) ? Rational128(point.dot(b))
00468                                                 : Rational128(point128.x * b.x + point128.y * b.y + point128.z * b.z, point128.denominator);
00469                                 }
00470 
00471                                 b3Scalar xvalue() const
00472                                 {
00473                                         return (point.index >= 0) ? b3Scalar(point.x) : point128.xvalue();
00474                                 }
00475 
00476                                 b3Scalar yvalue() const
00477                                 {
00478                                         return (point.index >= 0) ? b3Scalar(point.y) : point128.yvalue();
00479                                 }
00480 
00481                                 b3Scalar zvalue() const
00482                                 {
00483                                         return (point.index >= 0) ? b3Scalar(point.z) : point128.zvalue();
00484                                 }
00485 
00486                                 void receiveNearbyFaces(Vertex* src)
00487                                 {
00488                                         if (lastNearbyFace)
00489                                         {
00490                                                 lastNearbyFace->nextWithSameNearbyVertex = src->firstNearbyFace;
00491                                         }
00492                                         else
00493                                         {
00494                                                 firstNearbyFace = src->firstNearbyFace;
00495                                         }
00496                                         if (src->lastNearbyFace)
00497                                         {
00498                                                 lastNearbyFace = src->lastNearbyFace;
00499                                         }
00500                                         for (Face* f = src->firstNearbyFace; f; f = f->nextWithSameNearbyVertex)
00501                                         {
00502                                                 b3Assert(f->nearbyVertex == src);
00503                                                 f->nearbyVertex = this;
00504                                         }
00505                                         src->firstNearbyFace = NULL;
00506                                         src->lastNearbyFace = NULL;
00507                                 }
00508                 };

00511                 class Edge
00512                 {
00513                         public:
00514                                 Edge* next;
00515                                 Edge* prev;
00516                                 Edge* reverse;
00517                                 Vertex* target;
00518                                 Face* face;
00519                                 int copy;
00520 
00521                                 ~Edge()
00522                                 {
00523                                         next = NULL;
00524                                         prev = NULL;
00525                                         reverse = NULL;
00526                                         target = NULL;
00527                                         face = NULL;
00528                                 }
00529 
00530                                 void link(Edge* n)
00531                                 {
00532                                         b3Assert(reverse->target == n->reverse->target);
00533                                         next = n;
00534                                         n->prev = this;
00535                                 }
00536 
00537 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
00538                                 void print()
00539                                 {
00540                                         b3Printf("E%p : %d -> %d,  n=%p p=%p   (0 %d\t%d\t%d) -> (%d %d %d)", this, reverse->target->point.index, target->point.index, next, prev,
00541                                                                  reverse->target->point.x, reverse->target->point.y, reverse->target->point.z, target->point.x, target->point.y, target->point.z);
00542                                 }
00543 #endif
00544                 };

00546                 class Face
00547                 {
00548                         public:
00549                                 Face* next;
00550                                 Vertex* nearbyVertex;
00551                                 Face* nextWithSameNearbyVertex;
00552                                 Point32 origin;
00553                                 Point32 dir0;
00554                                 Point32 dir1;
00555 
00556                                 Face(): next(NULL), nearbyVertex(NULL), nextWithSameNearbyVertex(NULL)
00557                                 {
00558                                 }
00559 
00560                                 void init(Vertex* a, Vertex* b, Vertex* c)
00561                                 {
00562                                         nearbyVertex = a;
00563                                         origin = a->point;
00564                                         dir0 = *b - *a;
00565                                         dir1 = *c - *a;
00566                                         if (a->lastNearbyFace)
00567                                         {
00568                                                 a->lastNearbyFace->nextWithSameNearbyVertex = this;
00569                                         }
00570                                         else
00571                                         {
00572                                                 a->firstNearbyFace = this;
00573                                         }
00574                                         a->lastNearbyFace = this;
00575                                 }
00576 
00577                                 Point64 getNormal()
00578                                 {
00579                                         return dir0.cross(dir1);
00580                                 }
00581                 };

00583                 template<typename UWord, typename UHWord> class DMul
00584                 {
00585                         private:
00586                                 static btUint32_t high(btUint64_t value)
00587                                 {
00588                                         return (btUint32_t) (value >> 32);
00589                                 }
00590                                 
00591                                 static btUint32_t low(btUint64_t value)
00592                                 {
00593                                         return (btUint32_t) value;
00594                                 }
00595                                 
00596                                 static btUint64_t mul(btUint32_t a, btUint32_t b)
00597                                 {
00598                                         return (btUint64_t) a * (btUint64_t) b;
00599                                 }
00600                                 
00601                                 static void shlHalf(btUint64_t& value)
00602                                 {
00603                                         value <<= 32;
00604                                 }
00605                                 
00606                                 static btUint64_t high(Int128 value)
00607                                 {
00608                                         return value.high;
00609                                 }
00610                                 
00611                                 static btUint64_t low(Int128 value)
00612                                 {
00613                                         return value.low;
00614                                 }
00615                                 
00616                                 static Int128 mul(btUint64_t a, btUint64_t b)
00617                                 {
00618                                         return Int128::mul(a, b);
00619                                 }
00620                                 
00621                                 static void shlHalf(Int128& value)
00622                                 {
00623                                         value.high = value.low;
00624                                         value.low = 0;
00625                                 }
00626                                 
00627                         public:
00628                                 
00629                                 static void mul(UWord a, UWord b, UWord& resLow, UWord& resHigh)
00630                                 {
00631                                         UWord p00 = mul(low(a), low(b));
00632                                         UWord p01 = mul(low(a), high(b));
00633                                         UWord p10 = mul(high(a), low(b));
00634                                         UWord p11 = mul(high(a), high(b));
00635                                         UWord p0110 = UWord(low(p01)) + UWord(low(p10));
00636                                         p11 += high(p01);
00637                                         p11 += high(p10);
00638                                         p11 += high(p0110);
00639                                         shlHalf(p0110);
00640                                         p00 += p0110;
00641                                         if (p00 < p0110)
00642                                         {
00643                                                 ++p11;
00644                                         }
00645                                         resLow = p00;
00646                                         resHigh = p11;
00647                                 }
00648                 };

00669                 template <typename T> class PoolArray
00670                 {
00671                         private:
00672                                 T* array;
00673                                 int size;
00674 
00675                         public:
00676                                 PoolArray<T>* next;
00677 
00678                                 PoolArray(int size): size(size), next(NULL)
00679                                 {
00680                                         array = (T*) b3AlignedAlloc(sizeof(T) * size, 16);
00681                                 }
00682 
00683                                 ~PoolArray()
00684                                 {
00685                                         b3AlignedFree(array);
00686                                 }
00687 
00688                                 T* init()
00689                                 {
00690                                         T* o = array;
00691                                         for (int i = 0; i < size; i++, o++)
00692                                         {
00693                                                 o->next = (i+1 < size) ? o + 1 : NULL;
00694                                         }
00695                                         return array;
00696                                 }
00697                 };
00698 
00699                 template <typename T> class Pool
00700                 {
00701                         private:
00702                                 PoolArray<T>* arrays;
00703                                 PoolArray<T>* nextArray;
00704                                 T* freeObjects;
00705                                 int arraySize;
00706 
00707                         public:
00708                                 Pool(): arrays(NULL), nextArray(NULL), freeObjects(NULL), arraySize(256)
00709                                 {
00710                                 }
00711 
00712                                 ~Pool()
00713                                 {
00714                                         while (arrays)
00715                                         {
00716                                                 PoolArray<T>* p = arrays;
00717                                                 arrays = p->next;
00718                                                 p->~PoolArray<T>();
00719                                                 b3AlignedFree(p);
00720                                         }
00721                                 }
00722 
00723                                 void reset()
00724                                 {
00725                                         nextArray = arrays;
00726                                         freeObjects = NULL;
00727                                 }
00728 
00729                                 void setArraySize(int arraySize)
00730                                 {
00731                                         this->arraySize = arraySize;
00732                                 }
00733 
00734                                 T* newObject()
00735                                 {
00736                                         T* o = freeObjects;
00737                                         if (!o)
00738                                         {
00739                                                 PoolArray<T>* p = nextArray;
00740                                                 if (p)
00741                                                 {
00742                                                         nextArray = p->next;
00743                                                 }
00744                                                 else
00745                                                 {
00746                                                         p = new(b3AlignedAlloc(sizeof(PoolArray<T>), 16)) PoolArray<T>(arraySize);
00747                                                         p->next = arrays;
00748                                                         arrays = p;
00749                                                 }
00750                                                 o = p->init();
00751                                         }
00752                                         freeObjects = o->next;
00753                                         return new(o) T();
00754                                 };
00755 
00756                                 void freeObject(T* object)
00757                                 {
00758                                         object->~T();
00759                                         object->next = freeObjects;
00760                                         freeObjects = object;
00761                                 }
00762                 };
00763 
00764                 b3Vector3 scaling;
00765                 b3Vector3 center;
00766                 Pool<Vertex> vertexPool;
00767                 Pool<Edge> edgePool;
00768                 Pool<Face> facePool;
00769                 b3AlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> originalVertices;
00770                 int mergeStamp;
00771                 int minAxis;
00772                 int medAxis;
00773                 int maxAxis;
00774                 int usedEdgePairs;
00775                 int maxUsedEdgePairs;
00776 
00777                 static Orientation getOrientation(const Edge* prev, const Edge* next, const Point32& s, const Point32& t);
00778                 Edge* findMaxAngle(bool ccw, const Vertex* start, const Point32& s, const Point64& rxs, const Point64& sxrxs, Rational64& minCot);
00779                 void findEdgeForCoplanarFaces(Vertex* c0, Vertex* c1, Edge*& e0, Edge*& e1, Vertex* stop0, Vertex* stop1);
00780 
00781                 Edge* newEdgePair(Vertex* from, Vertex* to);
00782 
00783                 void removeEdgePair(Edge* edge)
00784                 {
00785                         Edge* n = edge->next;
00786                         Edge* r = edge->reverse;
00787 
00788                         b3Assert(edge->target && r->target);
00789 
00790                         if (n != edge)
00791                         {
00792                                 n->prev = edge->prev;
00793                                 edge->prev->next = n;
00794                                 r->target->edges = n;
00795                         }
00796                         else
00797                         {
00798                                 r->target->edges = NULL;
00799                         }
00800                         
00801                         n = r->next;
00802                         
00803                         if (n != r)
00804                         {
00805                                 n->prev = r->prev;
00806                                 r->prev->next = n;
00807                                 edge->target->edges = n;
00808                         }
00809                         else
00810                         {
00811                                 edge->target->edges = NULL;
00812                         }
00813 
00814                         edgePool.freeObject(edge);
00815                         edgePool.freeObject(r);
00816                         usedEdgePairs--;
00817                 }
00818                 
00819                 void computeInternal(int start, int end, IntermediateHull& result);
00820                 
00821                 bool mergeProjection(IntermediateHull& h0, IntermediateHull& h1, Vertex*& c0, Vertex*& c1);
00822                 
00823                 void merge(IntermediateHull& h0, IntermediateHull& h1);
00824 
00825                 b3Vector3 toBtVector(const Point32& v);
00826 
00827                 b3Vector3 getBtNormal(Face* face);
00828 
00829                 bool shiftFace(Face* face, b3Scalar amount, b3AlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> stack);
00830 
00831         public:
00832                 Vertex* vertexList;
00833 
00834                 void compute(const void* coords, bool doubleCoords, int stride, int count);
00835 
00836                 b3Vector3 getCoordinates(const Vertex* v);
00837 
00838                 b3Scalar shrink(b3Scalar amount, b3Scalar clampAmount);
00839 };
00840 
00841 
00842 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128::operator*(btInt64_t b) const
00843 {
00844         bool negative = (btInt64_t) high < 0;
00845         Int128 a = negative ? -*this : *this;
00846         if (b < 0)
00847         {
00848                 negative = !negative;
00849                 b = -b;
00850         }
00851         Int128 result = mul(a.low, (btUint64_t) b);
00852         result.high += a.high * (btUint64_t) b;
00853         return negative ? -result : result;
00854 }
00855 
00856 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128::mul(btInt64_t a, btInt64_t b)
00857 {
00858         Int128 result;
00859         
00860 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00861         __asm__ ("imulq %[b]"
00862                                          : "=a" (result.low), "=d" (result.high)
00863                                          : "0"(a), [b] "r"(b)
00864                                          : "cc" );
00865         return result;
00866         
00867 #else
00868         bool negative = a < 0;
00869         if (negative)
00870         {
00871                 a = -a;
00872         }
00873         if (b < 0)
00874         {
00875                 negative = !negative;
00876                 b = -b;
00877         }
00878         DMul<btUint64_t, btUint32_t>::mul((btUint64_t) a, (btUint64_t) b, result.low, result.high);
00879         return negative ? -result : result;
00880 #endif
00881 }
00882 
00883 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128 b3ConvexHullInternal::Int128::mul(btUint64_t a, btUint64_t b)
00884 {
00885         Int128 result;
00886 
00887 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00888         __asm__ ("mulq %[b]"
00889                                          : "=a" (result.low), "=d" (result.high)
00890                                          : "0"(a), [b] "r"(b)
00891                                          : "cc" );
00892 
00893 #else
00894         DMul<btUint64_t, btUint32_t>::mul(a, b, result.low, result.high);
00895 #endif
00896 
00897         return result;
00898 }
00899 
00900 int b3ConvexHullInternal::Rational64::compare(const Rational64& b) const
00901 {
00902         if (sign != b.sign)
00903         {
00904                 return sign - b.sign;
00905         }
00906         else if (sign == 0)
00907         {
00908                 return 0;
00909         }
00910 
00911         //      return (numerator * b.denominator > b.numerator * denominator) ? sign : (numerator * b.denominator < b.numerator * denominator) ? -sign : 0;
00912 
00913 #ifdef USE_X86_64_ASM
00914 
00915         int result;
00916         btInt64_t tmp;
00917         btInt64_t dummy;
00918         __asm__ ("mulq %[bn]\n\t"
00919                                          "movq %%rax, %[tmp]\n\t"
00920                                          "movq %%rdx, %%rbx\n\t"
00921                                          "movq %[tn], %%rax\n\t"
00922                                          "mulq %[bd]\n\t"
00923                                          "subq %[tmp], %%rax\n\t"
00924                                          "sbbq %%rbx, %%rdx\n\t" // rdx:rax contains 128-bit-difference "numerator*b.denominator - b.numerator*denominator"
00925                                          "setnsb %%bh\n\t" // bh=1 if difference is non-negative, bh=0 otherwise
00926                                          "orq %%rdx, %%rax\n\t"
00927                                          "setnzb %%bl\n\t" // bl=1 if difference if non-zero, bl=0 if it is zero
00928                                          "decb %%bh\n\t" // now bx=0x0000 if difference is zero, 0xff01 if it is negative, 0x0001 if it is positive (i.e., same sign as difference)
00929                                          "shll $16, %%ebx\n\t" // ebx has same sign as difference
00930                                          : "=&b"(result), [tmp] "=&r"(tmp), "=a"(dummy)
00931                                          : "a"(denominator), [bn] "g"(b.numerator), [tn] "g"(numerator), [bd] "g"(b.denominator)
00932                                          : "%rdx", "cc" );
00933         return result ? result ^ sign // if sign is +1, only bit 0 of result is inverted, which does not change the sign of result (and cannot result in zero)
00934                                                                                                                                 // if sign is -1, all bits of result are inverted, which changes the sign of result (and again cannot result in zero)
00935                                                                 : 0;
00936 
00937 #else
00938 
00939         return sign * Int128::mul(m_numerator, b.m_denominator).ucmp(Int128::mul(m_denominator, b.m_numerator));
00940 
00941 #endif
00942 }
00943 
00944 int b3ConvexHullInternal::Rational128::compare(const Rational128& b) const
00945 {
00946         if (sign != b.sign)
00947         {
00948                 return sign - b.sign;
00949         }
00950         else if (sign == 0)
00951         {
00952                 return 0;
00953         }
00954         if (isInt64)
00955         {
00956                 return -b.compare(sign * (btInt64_t) numerator.low);
00957         }
00958 
00959         Int128 nbdLow, nbdHigh, dbnLow, dbnHigh;
00960         DMul<Int128, btUint64_t>::mul(numerator, b.denominator, nbdLow, nbdHigh);
00961         DMul<Int128, btUint64_t>::mul(denominator, b.numerator, dbnLow, dbnHigh);
00962 
00963         int cmp = nbdHigh.ucmp(dbnHigh);
00964         if (cmp)
00965         {
00966                 return cmp * sign;
00967         }
00968         return nbdLow.ucmp(dbnLow) * sign;
00969 }
00970 
00971 int b3ConvexHullInternal::Rational128::compare(btInt64_t b) const
00972 {
00973         if (isInt64)
00974         {
00975                 btInt64_t a = sign * (btInt64_t) numerator.low;
00976                 return (a > b) ? 1 : (a < b) ? -1 : 0;
00977         }
00978         if (b > 0)
00979         {
00980                 if (sign <= 0)
00981                 {
00982                         return -1;
00983                 }
00984         }
00985         else if (b < 0)
00986         {
00987                 if (sign >= 0)
00988                 {
00989                         return 1;
00990                 }
00991                 b = -b;
00992         }
00993         else
00994         {
00995                 return sign;
00996         }
00997 
00998         return numerator.ucmp(denominator * b) * sign;
00999 }
01000 
01001 
01002 b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* b3ConvexHullInternal::newEdgePair(Vertex* from, Vertex* to)
01003 {
01004         b3Assert(from && to);
01005         Edge* e = edgePool.newObject();
01006         Edge* r = edgePool.newObject();
01007         e->reverse = r;
01008         r->reverse = e;
01009         e->copy = mergeStamp;
01010         r->copy = mergeStamp;
01011         e->target = to;
01012         r->target = from;
01013         e->face = NULL;
01014         r->face = NULL;
01015         usedEdgePairs++;
01016         if (usedEdgePairs > maxUsedEdgePairs)
01017         {
01018                 maxUsedEdgePairs = usedEdgePairs;
01019         }
01020         return e;
01021 }
01022 
01023 bool b3ConvexHullInternal::mergeProjection(IntermediateHull& h0, IntermediateHull& h1, Vertex*& c0, Vertex*& c1)
01024 {
01025         Vertex* v0 = h0.maxYx;
01026         Vertex* v1 = h1.minYx;
01027         if ((v0->point.x == v1->point.x) && (v0->point.y == v1->point.y))
01028         {
01029                 b3Assert(v0->point.z < v1->point.z);
01030                 Vertex* v1p = v1->prev;
01031                 if (v1p == v1)
01032                 {
01033                         c0 = v0;
01034                         if (v1->edges)
01035                         {
01036                                 b3Assert(v1->edges->next == v1->edges);
01037                                 v1 = v1->edges->target;
01038                                 b3Assert(v1->edges->next == v1->edges);
01039                         }
01040                         c1 = v1;
01041                         return false;
01042                 }
01043                 Vertex* v1n = v1->next;
01044                 v1p->next = v1n;
01045                 v1n->prev = v1p;
01046                 if (v1 == h1.minXy)
01047                 {
01048                         if ((v1n->point.x < v1p->point.x) || ((v1n->point.x == v1p->point.x) && (v1n->point.y < v1p->point.y)))
01049                         {
01050                                 h1.minXy = v1n;
01051                         }
01052                         else
01053                         {
01054                                 h1.minXy = v1p;
01055                         }
01056                 }
01057                 if (v1 == h1.maxXy)
01058                 {
01059                         if ((v1n->point.x > v1p->point.x) || ((v1n->point.x == v1p->point.x) && (v1n->point.y > v1p->point.y)))
01060                         {
01061                                 h1.maxXy = v1n;
01062                         }
01063                         else
01064                         {
01065                                 h1.maxXy = v1p;
01066                         }
01067                 }
01068         }
01069         
01070         v0 = h0.maxXy;
01071         v1 = h1.maxXy;
01072         Vertex* v00 = NULL;
01073         Vertex* v10 = NULL;
01074         btInt32_t sign = 1;
01075 
01076         for (int side = 0; side <= 1; side++)
01077         {               
01078                 btInt32_t dx = (v1->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01079                 if (dx > 0)
01080                 {
01081                         while (true)
01082                         {
01083                                 btInt32_t dy = v1->point.y - v0->point.y;
01084 
01085                                 Vertex* w0 = side ? v0->next : v0->prev;
01086                                 if (w0 != v0)
01087                                 {
01088                                         btInt32_t dx0 = (w0->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01089                                         btInt32_t dy0 = w0->point.y - v0->point.y;
01090                                         if ((dy0 <= 0) && ((dx0 == 0) || ((dx0 < 0) && (dy0 * dx <= dy * dx0))))
01091                                         {
01092                                                 v0 = w0;
01093                                                 dx = (v1->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01094                                                 continue;
01095                                         }
01096                                 }
01097 
01098                                 Vertex* w1 = side ? v1->next : v1->prev;
01099                                 if (w1 != v1)
01100                                 {
01101                                         btInt32_t dx1 = (w1->point.x - v1->point.x) * sign;
01102                                         btInt32_t dy1 = w1->point.y - v1->point.y;
01103                                         btInt32_t dxn = (w1->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01104                                         if ((dxn > 0) && (dy1 < 0) && ((dx1 == 0) || ((dx1 < 0) && (dy1 * dx < dy * dx1))))
01105                                         {
01106                                                 v1 = w1;
01107                                                 dx = dxn;
01108                                                 continue;
01109                                         }
01110                                 }
01111 
01112                                 break;
01113                         }
01114                 }
01115                 else if (dx < 0)
01116                 {
01117                         while (true)
01118                         {
01119                                 btInt32_t dy = v1->point.y - v0->point.y;
01120                                 
01121                                 Vertex* w1 = side ? v1->prev : v1->next;
01122                                 if (w1 != v1)
01123                                 {
01124                                         btInt32_t dx1 = (w1->point.x - v1->point.x) * sign;
01125                                         btInt32_t dy1 = w1->point.y - v1->point.y;
01126                                         if ((dy1 >= 0) && ((dx1 == 0) || ((dx1 < 0) && (dy1 * dx <= dy * dx1))))
01127                                         {
01128                                                 v1 = w1;
01129                                                 dx = (v1->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01130                                                 continue;
01131                                         }
01132                                 }
01133                                 
01134                                 Vertex* w0 = side ? v0->prev : v0->next;
01135                                 if (w0 != v0)
01136                                 {
01137                                         btInt32_t dx0 = (w0->point.x - v0->point.x) * sign;
01138                                         btInt32_t dy0 = w0->point.y - v0->point.y;
01139                                         btInt32_t dxn = (v1->point.x - w0->point.x) * sign;
01140                                         if ((dxn < 0) && (dy0 > 0) && ((dx0 == 0) || ((dx0 < 0) && (dy0 * dx < dy * dx0))))
01141                                         {
01142                                                 v0 = w0;
01143                                                 dx = dxn;
01144                                                 continue;
01145                                         }
01146                                 }
01147                                 
01148                                 break;
01149                         }
01150                 }
01151                 else
01152                 {
01153                         btInt32_t x = v0->point.x;
01154                         btInt32_t y0 = v0->point.y;
01155                         Vertex* w0 = v0;
01156                         Vertex* t;
01157                         while (((t = side ? w0->next : w0->prev) != v0) && (t->point.x == x) && (t->point.y <= y0))
01158                         {
01159                                 w0 = t;
01160                                 y0 = t->point.y;
01161                         }
01162                         v0 = w0;
01163 
01164                         btInt32_t y1 = v1->point.y;
01165                         Vertex* w1 = v1;
01166                         while (((t = side ? w1->prev : w1->next) != v1) && (t->point.x == x) && (t->point.y >= y1))
01167                         {
01168                                 w1 = t;
01169                                 y1 = t->point.y;
01170                         }
01171                         v1 = w1;
01172                 }
01173                 
01174                 if (side == 0)
01175                 {
01176                         v00 = v0;
01177                         v10 = v1;
01178 
01179                         v0 = h0.minXy;
01180                         v1 = h1.minXy;
01181                         sign = -1;
01182                 }
01183         }
01184 
01185         v0->prev = v1;
01186         v1->next = v0;
01187 
01188         v00->next = v10;
01189         v10->prev = v00;
01190 
01191         if (h1.minXy->point.x < h0.minXy->point.x)
01192         {
01193                 h0.minXy = h1.minXy;
01194         }
01195         if (h1.maxXy->point.x >= h0.maxXy->point.x)
01196         {
01197                 h0.maxXy = h1.maxXy;
01198         }
01199         
01200         h0.maxYx = h1.maxYx;
01201 
01202         c0 = v00;
01203         c1 = v10;
01204 
01205         return true;
01206 }
01207 
01208 void b3ConvexHullInternal::computeInternal(int start, int end, IntermediateHull& result)
01209 {
01210         int n = end - start;
01211         switch (n)
01212         {
01213                 case 0:
01214                         result.minXy = NULL;
01215                         result.maxXy = NULL;
01216                         result.minYx = NULL;
01217                         result.maxYx = NULL;
01218                         return;
01219                 case 2:
01220                 {
01221                         Vertex* v = originalVertices[start];
01222                         Vertex* w = v + 1;
01223                         if (v->point != w->point)
01224                         {
01225                                 btInt32_t dx = v->point.x - w->point.x;
01226                                 btInt32_t dy = v->point.y - w->point.y;
01227 
01228                                 if ((dx == 0) && (dy == 0))
01229                                 {
01230                                         if (v->point.z > w->point.z)
01231                                         {
01232                                                 Vertex* t = w;
01233                                                 w = v;
01234                                                 v = t;
01235                                         }
01236                                         b3Assert(v->point.z < w->point.z);
01237                                         v->next = v;
01238                                         v->prev = v;
01239                                         result.minXy = v;
01240                                         result.maxXy = v;
01241                                         result.minYx = v;
01242                                         result.maxYx = v;
01243                                 }
01244                                 else
01245                                 {
01246                                         v->next = w;
01247                                         v->prev = w;
01248                                         w->next = v;
01249                                         w->prev = v;
01250 
01251                                         if ((dx < 0) || ((dx == 0) && (dy < 0)))
01252                                         {
01253                                                 result.minXy = v;
01254                                                 result.maxXy = w;
01255                                         }
01256                                         else
01257                                         {
01258                                                 result.minXy = w;
01259                                                 result.maxXy = v;
01260                                         }
01261 
01262                                         if ((dy < 0) || ((dy == 0) && (dx < 0)))
01263                                         {
01264                                                 result.minYx = v;
01265                                                 result.maxYx = w;
01266                                         }
01267                                         else
01268                                         {
01269                                                 result.minYx = w;
01270                                                 result.maxYx = v;
01271                                         }
01272                                 }
01273 
01274                                 Edge* e = newEdgePair(v, w);
01275                                 e->link(e);
01276                                 v->edges = e;
01277 
01278                                 e = e->reverse;
01279                                 e->link(e);
01280                                 w->edges = e;
01281 
01282                                 return;
01283                         }
01284                 }
01285                 // lint -fallthrough
01286                 case 1:
01287                 {
01288                         Vertex* v = originalVertices[start];
01289                         v->edges = NULL;
01290                         v->next = v;
01291                         v->prev = v;
01292 
01293                         result.minXy = v;
01294                         result.maxXy = v;
01295                         result.minYx = v;
01296                         result.maxYx = v;
01297 
01298                         return;
01299                 }
01300         }
01301 
01302         int split0 = start + n / 2;
01303         Point32 p = originalVertices[split0-1]->point;
01304         int split1 = split0;
01305         while ((split1 < end) && (originalVertices[split1]->point == p))
01306         {
01307                 split1++;
01308         }
01309         computeInternal(start, split0, result);
01310         IntermediateHull hull1;
01311         computeInternal(split1, end, hull1);
01312 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01313         b3Printf("\n\nMerge\n");
01314         result.print();
01315         hull1.print();
01316 #endif
01317         merge(result, hull1);
01318 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01319         b3Printf("\n  Result\n");
01320         result.print();
01321 #endif
01322 }
01323 
01324 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01325 void b3ConvexHullInternal::IntermediateHull::print()
01326 {
01327         b3Printf("    Hull\n");
01328         for (Vertex* v = minXy; v; )
01329         {
01330                 b3Printf("      ");
01331                 v->print();
01332                 if (v == maxXy)
01333                 {
01334                         b3Printf(" maxXy");
01335                 }
01336                 if (v == minYx)
01337                 {
01338                         b3Printf(" minYx");
01339                 }
01340                 if (v == maxYx)
01341                 {
01342                         b3Printf(" maxYx");
01343                 }
01344                 if (v->next->prev != v)
01345                 {
01346                         b3Printf(" Inconsistency");
01347                 }
01348                 b3Printf("\n");
01349                 v = v->next;
01350                 if (v == minXy)
01351                 {
01352                         break;
01353                 }
01354         }
01355         if (minXy)
01356         {               
01357                 minXy->copy = (minXy->copy == -1) ? -2 : -1;
01358                 minXy->printGraph();
01359         }
01360 }
01361 
01362 void b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex::printGraph()
01363 {
01364         print();
01365         b3Printf("\nEdges\n");
01366         Edge* e = edges;
01367         if (e)
01368         {
01369                 do
01370                 {
01371                         e->print();
01372                         b3Printf("\n");
01373                         e = e->next;
01374                 } while (e != edges);
01375                 do
01376                 {
01377                         Vertex* v = e->target;
01378                         if (v->copy != copy)
01379                         {
01380                                 v->copy = copy;
01381                                 v->printGraph();
01382                         }
01383                         e = e->next;
01384                 } while (e != edges);
01385         }
01386 }
01387 #endif
01388 
01389 b3ConvexHullInternal::Orientation b3ConvexHullInternal::getOrientation(const Edge* prev, const Edge* next, const Point32& s, const Point32& t)
01390 {
01391         b3Assert(prev->reverse->target == next->reverse->target);
01392         if (prev->next == next)
01393         {
01394                 if (prev->prev == next)
01395                 {
01396                         Point64 n = t.cross(s);
01397                         Point64 m = (*prev->target - *next->reverse->target).cross(*next->target - *next->reverse->target);
01398                         b3Assert(!m.isZero());
01399                         btInt64_t dot = n.dot(m);
01400                         b3Assert(dot != 0);
01401                         return (dot > 0) ? COUNTER_CLOCKWISE : CLOCKWISE;
01402                 }
01403                 return COUNTER_CLOCKWISE;
01404         }
01405         else if (prev->prev == next)
01406         {
01407                 return CLOCKWISE;
01408         }
01409         else
01410         {
01411                 return NONE;
01412         }
01413 }
01414 
01415 b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* b3ConvexHullInternal::findMaxAngle(bool ccw, const Vertex* start, const Point32& s, const Point64& rxs, const Point64& sxrxs, Rational64& minCot)
01416 {
01417         Edge* minEdge = NULL;
01418 
01419 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01420         b3Printf("find max edge for %d\n", start->point.index);
01421 #endif
01422         Edge* e = start->edges;
01423         if (e)
01424         {
01425                 do
01426                 {
01427                         if (e->copy > mergeStamp)
01428                         {
01429                                 Point32 t = *e->target - *start;
01430                                 Rational64 cot(t.dot(sxrxs), t.dot(rxs));
01431 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01432                                 b3Printf("      Angle is %f (%d) for ", (float) b3Atan(cot.toScalar()), (int) cot.isNaN());
01433                                 e->print();
01434 #endif
01435                                 if (cot.isNaN())
01436                                 {
01437                                         b3Assert(ccw ? (t.dot(s) < 0) : (t.dot(s) > 0));
01438                                 }
01439                                 else
01440                                 {
01441                                         int cmp;
01442                                         if (minEdge == NULL)
01443                                         {
01444                                                 minCot = cot;
01445                                                 minEdge = e;
01446                                         }
01447                                         else if ((cmp = cot.compare(minCot)) < 0)
01448                                         {
01449                                                 minCot = cot;
01450                                                 minEdge = e;
01451                                         }
01452                                         else if ((cmp == 0) && (ccw == (getOrientation(minEdge, e, s, t) == COUNTER_CLOCKWISE)))
01453                                         {
01454                                                 minEdge = e;
01455                                         }
01456                                 }
01457 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01458                                 b3Printf("\n");
01459 #endif
01460                         }
01461                         e = e->next;
01462                 } while (e != start->edges);
01463         }
01464         return minEdge;
01465 }
01466 
01467 void b3ConvexHullInternal::findEdgeForCoplanarFaces(Vertex* c0, Vertex* c1, Edge*& e0, Edge*& e1, Vertex* stop0, Vertex* stop1)
01468 {
01469         Edge* start0 = e0;
01470         Edge* start1 = e1;
01471         Point32 et0 = start0 ? start0->target->point : c0->point;
01472         Point32 et1 = start1 ? start1->target->point : c1->point;
01473         Point32 s = c1->point - c0->point;
01474         Point64 normal = ((start0 ? start0 : start1)->target->point - c0->point).cross(s);
01475         btInt64_t dist = c0->point.dot(normal);
01476         b3Assert(!start1 || (start1->target->point.dot(normal) == dist));
01477         Point64 perp = s.cross(normal);
01478         b3Assert(!perp.isZero());
01479         
01480 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01481         b3Printf("   Advancing %d %d  (%p %p, %d %d)\n", c0->point.index, c1->point.index, start0, start1, start0 ? start0->target->point.index : -1, start1 ? start1->target->point.index : -1);
01482 #endif
01483 
01484         btInt64_t maxDot0 = et0.dot(perp);
01485         if (e0)
01486         {
01487                 while (e0->target != stop0)
01488                 {
01489                         Edge* e = e0->reverse->prev;
01490                         if (e->target->point.dot(normal) < dist)
01491                         {
01492                                 break;
01493                         }
01494                         b3Assert(e->target->point.dot(normal) == dist);
01495                         if (e->copy == mergeStamp)
01496                         {
01497                                 break;
01498                         }
01499                         btInt64_t dot = e->target->point.dot(perp);
01500                         if (dot <= maxDot0)
01501                         {
01502                                 break;
01503                         }
01504                         maxDot0 = dot;
01505                         e0 = e;
01506                         et0 = e->target->point;
01507                 }
01508         }
01509         
01510         btInt64_t maxDot1 = et1.dot(perp);
01511         if (e1)
01512         {
01513                 while (e1->target != stop1)
01514                 {
01515                         Edge* e = e1->reverse->next;
01516                         if (e->target->point.dot(normal) < dist)
01517                         {
01518                                 break;
01519                         }
01520                         b3Assert(e->target->point.dot(normal) == dist);
01521                         if (e->copy == mergeStamp)
01522                         {
01523                                 break;
01524                         }
01525                         btInt64_t dot = e->target->point.dot(perp);
01526                         if (dot <= maxDot1)
01527                         {
01528                                 break;
01529                         }
01530                         maxDot1 = dot;
01531                         e1 = e;
01532                         et1 = e->target->point;
01533                 }
01534         }
01535 
01536 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01537         b3Printf("   Starting at %d %d\n", et0.index, et1.index);
01538 #endif
01539 
01540         btInt64_t dx = maxDot1 - maxDot0;
01541         if (dx > 0)
01542         {
01543                 while (true)
01544                 {
01545                         btInt64_t dy = (et1 - et0).dot(s);
01546                         
01547                         if (e0 && (e0->target != stop0))
01548                         {
01549                                 Edge* f0 = e0->next->reverse;
01550                                 if (f0->copy > mergeStamp)
01551                                 {
01552                                         btInt64_t dx0 = (f0->target->point - et0).dot(perp);
01553                                         btInt64_t dy0 = (f0->target->point - et0).dot(s);
01554                                         if ((dx0 == 0) ? (dy0 < 0) : ((dx0 < 0) && (Rational64(dy0, dx0).compare(Rational64(dy, dx)) >= 0)))
01555                                         {
01556                                                 et0 = f0->target->point;
01557                                                 dx = (et1 - et0).dot(perp);
01558                                                 e0 = (e0 == start0) ? NULL : f0;
01559                                                 continue;
01560                                         }
01561                                 }
01562                         }
01563                         
01564                         if (e1 && (e1->target != stop1))
01565                         {
01566                                 Edge* f1 = e1->reverse->next;
01567                                 if (f1->copy > mergeStamp)
01568                                 {
01569                                         Point32 d1 = f1->target->point - et1;
01570                                         if (d1.dot(normal) == 0)
01571                                         {
01572                                                 btInt64_t dx1 = d1.dot(perp);
01573                                                 btInt64_t dy1 = d1.dot(s);
01574                                                 btInt64_t dxn = (f1->target->point - et0).dot(perp);
01575                                                 if ((dxn > 0) && ((dx1 == 0) ? (dy1 < 0) : ((dx1 < 0) && (Rational64(dy1, dx1).compare(Rational64(dy, dx)) > 0))))
01576                                                 {
01577                                                         e1 = f1;
01578                                                         et1 = e1->target->point;
01579                                                         dx = dxn;
01580                                                         continue;
01581                                                 }
01582                                         }
01583                                         else
01584                                         {
01585                                                 b3Assert((e1 == start1) && (d1.dot(normal) < 0));
01586                                         }
01587                                 }
01588                         }
01589 
01590                         break;
01591                 }
01592         }
01593         else if (dx < 0)
01594         {
01595                 while (true)
01596                 {
01597                         btInt64_t dy = (et1 - et0).dot(s);
01598                         
01599                         if (e1 && (e1->target != stop1))
01600                         {
01601                                 Edge* f1 = e1->prev->reverse;
01602                                 if (f1->copy > mergeStamp)
01603                                 {
01604                                         btInt64_t dx1 = (f1->target->point - et1).dot(perp);
01605                                         btInt64_t dy1 = (f1->target->point - et1).dot(s);
01606                                         if ((dx1 == 0) ? (dy1 > 0) : ((dx1 < 0) && (Rational64(dy1, dx1).compare(Rational64(dy, dx)) <= 0)))
01607                                         {
01608                                                 et1 = f1->target->point;
01609                                                 dx = (et1 - et0).dot(perp);
01610                                                 e1 = (e1 == start1) ? NULL : f1;
01611                                                 continue;
01612                                         }
01613                                 }
01614                         }
01615                         
01616                         if (e0 && (e0->target != stop0))
01617                         {
01618                                 Edge* f0 = e0->reverse->prev;
01619                                 if (f0->copy > mergeStamp)
01620                                 {
01621                                         Point32 d0 = f0->target->point - et0;
01622                                         if (d0.dot(normal) == 0)
01623                                         {
01624                                                 btInt64_t dx0 = d0.dot(perp);
01625                                                 btInt64_t dy0 = d0.dot(s);
01626                                                 btInt64_t dxn = (et1 - f0->target->point).dot(perp);
01627                                                 if ((dxn < 0) && ((dx0 == 0) ? (dy0 > 0) : ((dx0 < 0) && (Rational64(dy0, dx0).compare(Rational64(dy, dx)) < 0))))
01628                                                 {
01629                                                         e0 = f0;
01630                                                         et0 = e0->target->point;
01631                                                         dx = dxn;
01632                                                         continue;
01633                                                 }
01634                                         }
01635                                         else
01636                                         {
01637                                                 b3Assert((e0 == start0) && (d0.dot(normal) < 0));
01638                                         }
01639                                 }
01640                         }
01641 
01642                         break;
01643                 }
01644         }
01645 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01646         b3Printf("   Advanced edges to %d %d\n", et0.index, et1.index);
01647 #endif
01648 }
01649 
01650 
01651 void b3ConvexHullInternal::merge(IntermediateHull& h0, IntermediateHull& h1)
01652 {
01653         if (!h1.maxXy)
01654         {
01655                 return;
01656         }
01657         if (!h0.maxXy)
01658         {
01659                 h0 = h1;
01660                 return;
01661         }
01662         
01663         mergeStamp--;
01664 
01665         Vertex* c0 = NULL;
01666         Edge* toPrev0 = NULL;
01667         Edge* firstNew0 = NULL;
01668         Edge* pendingHead0 = NULL;
01669         Edge* pendingTail0 = NULL;
01670         Vertex* c1 = NULL;
01671         Edge* toPrev1 = NULL;
01672         Edge* firstNew1 = NULL;
01673         Edge* pendingHead1 = NULL;
01674         Edge* pendingTail1 = NULL;
01675         Point32 prevPoint;
01676 
01677         if (mergeProjection(h0, h1, c0, c1))
01678         {
01679                 Point32 s = *c1 - *c0;
01680                 Point64 normal = Point32(0, 0, -1).cross(s);
01681                 Point64 t = s.cross(normal);
01682                 b3Assert(!t.isZero());
01683 
01684                 Edge* e = c0->edges;
01685                 Edge* start0 = NULL;
01686                 if (e)
01687                 {
01688                         do
01689                         {
01690                                 btInt64_t dot = (*e->target - *c0).dot(normal);
01691                                 b3Assert(dot <= 0);
01692                                 if ((dot == 0) && ((*e->target - *c0).dot(t) > 0))
01693                                 {
01694                                         if (!start0 || (getOrientation(start0, e, s, Point32(0, 0, -1)) == CLOCKWISE))
01695                                         {
01696                                                 start0 = e;
01697                                         }
01698                                 }
01699                                 e = e->next;
01700                         } while (e != c0->edges);
01701                 }
01702                 
01703                 e = c1->edges;
01704                 Edge* start1 = NULL;
01705                 if (e)
01706                 {
01707                         do
01708                         {
01709                                 btInt64_t dot = (*e->target - *c1).dot(normal);
01710                                 b3Assert(dot <= 0);
01711                                 if ((dot == 0) && ((*e->target - *c1).dot(t) > 0))
01712                                 {
01713                                         if (!start1 || (getOrientation(start1, e, s, Point32(0, 0, -1)) == COUNTER_CLOCKWISE))
01714                                         {
01715                                                 start1 = e;
01716                                         }
01717                                 }
01718                                 e = e->next;
01719                         } while (e != c1->edges);
01720                 }
01721 
01722                 if (start0 || start1)
01723                 {
01724                         findEdgeForCoplanarFaces(c0, c1, start0, start1, NULL, NULL);
01725                         if (start0)
01726                         {
01727                                 c0 = start0->target;
01728                         }
01729                         if (start1)
01730                         {
01731                                 c1 = start1->target;
01732                         }
01733                 }
01734 
01735                 prevPoint = c1->point;
01736                 prevPoint.z++;
01737         }
01738         else
01739         {
01740                 prevPoint = c1->point;
01741                 prevPoint.x++;
01742         }
01743 
01744         Vertex* first0 = c0;
01745         Vertex* first1 = c1;
01746         bool firstRun = true;
01747 
01748         while (true)
01749         {
01750                 Point32 s = *c1 - *c0;
01751                 Point32 r = prevPoint - c0->point;
01752                 Point64 rxs = r.cross(s);
01753                 Point64 sxrxs = s.cross(rxs);
01754                 
01755 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01756                 b3Printf("\n  Checking %d %d\n", c0->point.index, c1->point.index);
01757 #endif
01758                 Rational64 minCot0(0, 0);
01759                 Edge* min0 = findMaxAngle(false, c0, s, rxs, sxrxs, minCot0);
01760                 Rational64 minCot1(0, 0);
01761                 Edge* min1 = findMaxAngle(true, c1, s, rxs, sxrxs, minCot1);
01762                 if (!min0 && !min1)
01763                 {
01764                         Edge* e = newEdgePair(c0, c1);
01765                         e->link(e);
01766                         c0->edges = e;
01767 
01768                         e = e->reverse;
01769                         e->link(e);
01770                         c1->edges = e;
01771                         return;
01772                 }
01773                 else
01774                 {
01775                         int cmp = !min0 ? 1 : !min1 ? -1 : minCot0.compare(minCot1);
01776 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01777                         b3Printf("    -> Result %d\n", cmp);
01778 #endif
01779                         if (firstRun || ((cmp >= 0) ? !minCot1.isNegativeInfinity() : !minCot0.isNegativeInfinity()))
01780                         {
01781                                 Edge* e = newEdgePair(c0, c1);
01782                                 if (pendingTail0)
01783                                 {
01784                                         pendingTail0->prev = e;
01785                                 }
01786                                 else
01787                                 {
01788                                         pendingHead0 = e;
01789                                 }
01790                                 e->next = pendingTail0;
01791                                 pendingTail0 = e;
01792 
01793                                 e = e->reverse;
01794                                 if (pendingTail1)
01795                                 {
01796                                         pendingTail1->next = e;
