01797                                 }
01798                                 else
01799                                 {
01800                                         pendingHead1 = e;
01801                                 }
01802                                 e->prev = pendingTail1;
01803                                 pendingTail1 = e;
01804                         }
01805                         
01806                         Edge* e0 = min0;
01807                         Edge* e1 = min1;
01808 
01809 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
01810                         b3Printf("   Found min edges to %d %d\n", e0 ? e0->target->point.index : -1, e1 ? e1->target->point.index : -1);
01811 #endif
01812 
01813                         if (cmp == 0)
01814                         {
01815                                 findEdgeForCoplanarFaces(c0, c1, e0, e1, NULL, NULL);
01816                         }
01817 
01818                         if ((cmp >= 0) && e1)
01819                         {
01820                                 if (toPrev1)
01821                                 {
01822                                         for (Edge* e = toPrev1->next, *n = NULL; e != min1; e = n)
01823                                         {
01824                                                 n = e->next;
01825                                                 removeEdgePair(e);
01826                                         }
01827                                 }
01828 
01829                                 if (pendingTail1)
01830                                 {
01831                                         if (toPrev1)
01832                                         {
01833                                                 toPrev1->link(pendingHead1);
01834                                         }
01835                                         else
01836                                         {
01837                                                 min1->prev->link(pendingHead1);
01838                                                 firstNew1 = pendingHead1;
01839                                         }
01840                                         pendingTail1->link(min1);
01841                                         pendingHead1 = NULL;
01842                                         pendingTail1 = NULL;
01843                                 }
01844                                 else if (!toPrev1)
01845                                 {
01846                                         firstNew1 = min1;
01847                                 }
01848 
01849                                 prevPoint = c1->point;
01850                                 c1 = e1->target;
01851                                 toPrev1 = e1->reverse;
01852                         }
01853 
01854                         if ((cmp <= 0) && e0)
01855                         {
01856                                 if (toPrev0)
01857                                 {
01858                                         for (Edge* e = toPrev0->prev, *n = NULL; e != min0; e = n)
01859                                         {
01860                                                 n = e->prev;
01861                                                 removeEdgePair(e);
01862                                         }
01863                                 }
01864 
01865                                 if (pendingTail0)
01866                                 {
01867                                         if (toPrev0)
01868                                         {
01869                                                 pendingHead0->link(toPrev0);
01870                                         }
01871                                         else
01872                                         {
01873                                                 pendingHead0->link(min0->next);
01874                                                 firstNew0 = pendingHead0;
01875                                         }
01876                                         min0->link(pendingTail0);
01877                                         pendingHead0 = NULL;
01878                                         pendingTail0 = NULL;
01879                                 }
01880                                 else if (!toPrev0)
01881                                 {
01882                                         firstNew0 = min0;
01883                                 }
01884 
01885                                 prevPoint = c0->point;
01886                                 c0 = e0->target;
01887                                 toPrev0 = e0->reverse;
01888                         }
01889                 }
01890 
01891                 if ((c0 == first0) && (c1 == first1))
01892                 {
01893                         if (toPrev0 == NULL)
01894                         {
01895                                 pendingHead0->link(pendingTail0);
01896                                 c0->edges = pendingTail0;
01897                         }
01898                         else
01899                         {
01900                                 for (Edge* e = toPrev0->prev, *n = NULL; e != firstNew0; e = n)
01901                                 {
01902                                         n = e->prev;
01903                                         removeEdgePair(e);
01904                                 }
01905                                 if (pendingTail0)
01906                                 {
01907                                         pendingHead0->link(toPrev0);
01908                                         firstNew0->link(pendingTail0);
01909                                 }
01910                         }
01911 
01912                         if (toPrev1 == NULL)
01913                         {
01914                                 pendingTail1->link(pendingHead1);
01915                                 c1->edges = pendingTail1;
01916                         }
01917                         else
01918                         {
01919                                 for (Edge* e = toPrev1->next, *n = NULL; e != firstNew1; e = n)
01920                                 {
01921                                         n = e->next;
01922                                         removeEdgePair(e);
01923                                 }
01924                                 if (pendingTail1)
01925                                 {
01926                                         toPrev1->link(pendingHead1);
01927                                         pendingTail1->link(firstNew1);
01928                                 }
01929                         }
01930                         
01931                         return;
01932                 }
01933 
01934                 firstRun = false;
01935         }
01936 }
01937 
01938 
01939 static bool b3PointCmp(const b3ConvexHullInternal::Point32& p, const b3ConvexHullInternal::Point32& q)
01940 {
01941         return (p.y < q.y) || ((p.y == q.y) && ((p.x < q.x) || ((p.x == q.x) && (p.z < q.z))));
01942 }
01943 
01944 void b3ConvexHullInternal::compute(const void* coords, bool doubleCoords, int stride, int count)
01945 {
01946         b3Vector3 min = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(1e30), b3Scalar(1e30), b3Scalar(1e30)),  max = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(-1e30), b3Scalar(-1e30), b3Scalar(-1e30));
01947         const char* ptr = (const char*) coords;
01948         if (doubleCoords)
01949         {
01950                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01951                 {
01952                         const double* v = (const double*) ptr;
01953                         b3Vector3 p = b3MakeVector3((b3Scalar) v[0], (b3Scalar) v[1], (b3Scalar) v[2]);
01954                         ptr += stride;
01955                         min.setMin(p);
01956                         max.setMax(p);
01957                 }
01958         }
01959         else
01960         {
01961                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
01962                 {
01963                         const float* v = (const float*) ptr;
01964                         b3Vector3 p = b3MakeVector3(v[0], v[1], v[2]);
01965                         ptr += stride;
01966                         min.setMin(p);
01967                         max.setMax(p);
01968                 }
01969         }
01970 
01971         b3Vector3 s = max - min;
01972         maxAxis = s.maxAxis();
01973         minAxis = s.minAxis();
01974         if (minAxis == maxAxis)
01975         {
01976                 minAxis = (maxAxis + 1) % 3;
01977         }
01978         medAxis = 3 - maxAxis - minAxis;
01979 
01980         s /= b3Scalar(10216);
01981         if (((medAxis + 1) % 3) != maxAxis)
01982         {
01983                 s *= -1;
01984         }
01985         scaling = s;
01986 
01987         if (s[0] != 0)
01988         {
01989                 s[0] = b3Scalar(1) / s[0];
01990         }
01991         if (s[1] != 0)
01992         {
01993                 s[1] = b3Scalar(1) / s[1];
01994         }
01995         if (s[2] != 0)
01996         {
01997                 s[2] = b3Scalar(1) / s[2];
01998         }
01999 
02000         center = (min + max) * b3Scalar(0.5);
02001 
02002         b3AlignedObjectArray<Point32> points;
02003         points.resize(count);
02004         ptr = (const char*) coords;
02005         if (doubleCoords)
02006         {
02007                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02008                 {
02009                         const double* v = (const double*) ptr;
02010                         b3Vector3 p = b3MakeVector3((b3Scalar) v[0], (b3Scalar) v[1], (b3Scalar) v[2]);
02011                         ptr += stride;
02012                         p = (p - center) * s;
02013                         points[i].x = (btInt32_t) p[medAxis];
02014                         points[i].y = (btInt32_t) p[maxAxis];
02015                         points[i].z = (btInt32_t) p[minAxis];
02016                         points[i].index = i;
02017                 }
02018         }
02019         else
02020         {
02021                 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02022                 {
02023                         const float* v = (const float*) ptr;
02024                         b3Vector3 p = b3MakeVector3(v[0], v[1], v[2]);
02025                         ptr += stride;
02026                         p = (p - center) * s;
02027                         points[i].x = (btInt32_t) p[medAxis];
02028                         points[i].y = (btInt32_t) p[maxAxis];
02029                         points[i].z = (btInt32_t) p[minAxis];
02030                         points[i].index = i;
02031                 }
02032         }
02033         points.quickSort(b3PointCmp);
02034 
02035         vertexPool.reset();
02036         vertexPool.setArraySize(count);
02037         originalVertices.resize(count);
02038         for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02039         {
02040                 Vertex* v = vertexPool.newObject();
02041                 v->edges = NULL;
02042                 v->point = points[i];
02043                 v->copy = -1;
02044                 originalVertices[i] = v;
02045         }
02046 
02047         points.clear();
02048 
02049         edgePool.reset();
02050         edgePool.setArraySize(6 * count);
02051 
02052         usedEdgePairs = 0;
02053         maxUsedEdgePairs = 0;
02054 
02055         mergeStamp = -3;
02056 
02057         IntermediateHull hull;
02058         computeInternal(0, count, hull);
02059         vertexList = hull.minXy;
02060 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02061         b3Printf("max. edges %d (3v = %d)", maxUsedEdgePairs, 3 * count);
02062 #endif
02063 }
02064 
02065 b3Vector3 b3ConvexHullInternal::toBtVector(const Point32& v)
02066 {
02067         b3Vector3 p;
02068         p[medAxis] = b3Scalar(v.x);
02069         p[maxAxis] = b3Scalar(v.y);
02070         p[minAxis] = b3Scalar(v.z);
02071         return p * scaling;
02072 }
02073 
02074 b3Vector3 b3ConvexHullInternal::getBtNormal(Face* face)
02075 {
02076         return toBtVector(face->dir0).cross(toBtVector(face->dir1)).normalized();
02077 }
02078 
02079 b3Vector3 b3ConvexHullInternal::getCoordinates(const Vertex* v)
02080 {
02081         b3Vector3 p;
02082         p[medAxis] = v->xvalue();
02083         p[maxAxis] = v->yvalue();
02084         p[minAxis] = v->zvalue();
02085         return p * scaling + center;
02086 }
02087 
02088 b3Scalar b3ConvexHullInternal::shrink(b3Scalar amount, b3Scalar clampAmount)
02089 {
02090         if (!vertexList)
02091         {
02092                 return 0;
02093         }
02094         int stamp = --mergeStamp;
02095         b3AlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> stack;
02096         vertexList->copy = stamp;
02097         stack.push_back(vertexList);
02098         b3AlignedObjectArray<Face*> faces;
02099 
02100         Point32 ref = vertexList->point;
02101         Int128 hullCenterX(0, 0);
02102         Int128 hullCenterY(0, 0);
02103         Int128 hullCenterZ(0, 0);
02104         Int128 volume(0, 0);
02105 
02106         while (stack.size() > 0)
02107         {
02108                 Vertex* v = stack[stack.size() - 1];
02109                 stack.pop_back();
02110                 Edge* e = v->edges;
02111                 if (e)
02112                 {
02113                         do
02114                         {
02115                                 if (e->target->copy != stamp)
02116                                 {
02117                                         e->target->copy = stamp;
02118                                         stack.push_back(e->target);
02119                                 }
02120                                 if (e->copy != stamp)
02121                                 {
02122                                         Face* face = facePool.newObject();
02123                                         face->init(e->target, e->reverse->prev->target, v);
02124                                         faces.push_back(face);
02125                                         Edge* f = e;
02126 
02127                                         Vertex* a = NULL;
02128                                         Vertex* b = NULL;
02129                                         do
02130                                         {
02131                                                 if (a && b)
02132                                                 {
02133                                                         btInt64_t vol = (v->point - ref).dot((a->point - ref).cross(b->point - ref));
02134                                                         b3Assert(vol >= 0);
02135                                                         Point32 c = v->point + a->point + b->point + ref;
02136                                                         hullCenterX += vol * c.x;
02137                                                         hullCenterY += vol * c.y;
02138                                                         hullCenterZ += vol * c.z;
02139                                                         volume += vol;
02140                                                 }
02141 
02142                                                 b3Assert(f->copy != stamp);
02143                                                 f->copy = stamp;
02144                                                 f->face = face;
02145 
02146                                                 a = b;
02147                                                 b = f->target;
02148 
02149                                                 f = f->reverse->prev;
02150                                         } while (f != e);
02151                                 }
02152                                 e = e->next;
02153                         } while (e != v->edges);
02154                 }
02155         }
02156 
02157         if (volume.getSign() <= 0)
02158         {
02159                 return 0;
02160         }
02161 
02162         b3Vector3 hullCenter;
02163         hullCenter[medAxis] = hullCenterX.toScalar();
02164         hullCenter[maxAxis] = hullCenterY.toScalar();
02165         hullCenter[minAxis] = hullCenterZ.toScalar();
02166         hullCenter /= 4 * volume.toScalar();
02167         hullCenter *= scaling;
02168 
02169         int faceCount = faces.size();
02170 
02171         if (clampAmount > 0)
02172         {
02173                 b3Scalar minDist = B3_INFINITY;
02174                 for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++)
02175                 {
02176                         b3Vector3 normal = getBtNormal(faces[i]);
02177                         b3Scalar dist = normal.dot(toBtVector(faces[i]->origin) - hullCenter);
02178                         if (dist < minDist)
02179                         {
02180                                 minDist = dist;
02181                         }
02182                 }
02183                 
02184                 if (minDist <= 0)
02185                 {
02186                         return 0;
02187                 }
02188 
02189                 amount = b3Min(amount, minDist * clampAmount);
02190         }
02191 
02192         unsigned int seed = 243703;
02193         for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++, seed = 1664525 * seed + 1013904223)
02194         {
02195                 b3Swap(faces[i], faces[seed % faceCount]);
02196         }
02197 
02198         for (int i = 0; i < faceCount; i++)
02199         {
02200                 if (!shiftFace(faces[i], amount, stack))
02201                 {
02202                         return -amount;
02203                 }
02204         }
02205 
02206         return amount;
02207 }
02208 
02209 bool b3ConvexHullInternal::shiftFace(Face* face, b3Scalar amount, b3AlignedObjectArray<Vertex*> stack)
02210 {
02211         b3Vector3 origShift = getBtNormal(face) * -amount;
02212         if (scaling[0] != 0)
02213         {
02214                 origShift[0] /= scaling[0];
02215         }
02216         if (scaling[1] != 0)
02217         {
02218                 origShift[1] /= scaling[1];
02219         }
02220         if (scaling[2] != 0)
02221         {
02222                 origShift[2] /= scaling[2];
02223         }
02224         Point32 shift((btInt32_t) origShift[medAxis], (btInt32_t) origShift[maxAxis], (btInt32_t) origShift[minAxis]);
02225         if (shift.isZero())
02226         {
02227                 return true;
02228         }
02229         Point64 normal = face->getNormal();
02230 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02231         b3Printf("\nShrinking face (%d %d %d) (%d %d %d) (%d %d %d) by (%d %d %d)\n",
02232                                  face->origin.x, face->origin.y, face->origin.z, face->dir0.x, face->dir0.y, face->dir0.z, face->dir1.x, face->dir1.y, face->dir1.z, shift.x, shift.y, shift.z);
02233 #endif
02234         btInt64_t origDot = face->origin.dot(normal);
02235         Point32 shiftedOrigin = face->origin + shift;
02236         btInt64_t shiftedDot = shiftedOrigin.dot(normal);
02237         b3Assert(shiftedDot <= origDot);
02238         if (shiftedDot >= origDot)
02239         {
02240                 return false;
02241         }
02242 
02243         Edge* intersection = NULL;
02244 
02245         Edge* startEdge = face->nearbyVertex->edges;
02246 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02247         b3Printf("Start edge is ");
02248         startEdge->print();
02249         b3Printf(", normal is (%lld %lld %lld), shifted dot is %lld\n", normal.x, normal.y, normal.z, shiftedDot);
02250 #endif
02251         Rational128 optDot = face->nearbyVertex->dot(normal);
02252         int cmp = optDot.compare(shiftedDot);
02253 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02254         int n = 0;
02255 #endif
02256         if (cmp >= 0)
02257         {
02258                 Edge* e = startEdge;
02259                 do
02260                 {
02261 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02262                         n++;
02263 #endif
02264                         Rational128 dot = e->target->dot(normal);
02265                         b3Assert(dot.compare(origDot) <= 0);
02266 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02267                         b3Printf("Moving downwards, edge is ");
02268                         e->print();
02269                         b3Printf(", dot is %f (%f %lld)\n", (float) dot.toScalar(), (float) optDot.toScalar(), shiftedDot);
02270 #endif
02271                         if (dot.compare(optDot) < 0)
02272                         {
02273                                 int c = dot.compare(shiftedDot);
02274                                 optDot = dot;
02275                                 e = e->reverse;
02276                                 startEdge = e;
02277                                 if (c < 0)
02278                                 {
02279                                         intersection = e;
02280                                         break;
02281                                 }
02282                                 cmp = c;
02283                         }
02284                         e = e->prev;
02285                 } while (e != startEdge);
02286 
02287                 if (!intersection)
02288                 {
02289                         return false;
02290                 }
02291         }
02292         else
02293         {
02294                 Edge* e = startEdge;
02295                 do
02296                 {
02297 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02298                         n++;
02299 #endif
02300                         Rational128 dot = e->target->dot(normal);
02301                         b3Assert(dot.compare(origDot) <= 0);
02302 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02303                         b3Printf("Moving upwards, edge is ");
02304                         e->print();
02305                         b3Printf(", dot is %f (%f %lld)\n", (float) dot.toScalar(), (float) optDot.toScalar(), shiftedDot);
02306 #endif
02307                         if (dot.compare(optDot) > 0)
02308                         {
02309                                 cmp = dot.compare(shiftedDot);
02310                                 if (cmp >= 0)
02311                                 {
02312                                         intersection = e;
02313                                         break;
02314                                 }
02315                                 optDot = dot;
02316                                 e = e->reverse;
02317                                 startEdge = e;
02318                         }
02319                         e = e->prev;
02320                 } while (e != startEdge);
02321                 
02322                 if (!intersection)
02323                 {
02324                         return true;
02325                 }
02326         }
02327 
02328 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02329         b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to find initial intersection\n", n);
02330 #endif
02331 
02332         if (cmp == 0)
02333         {
02334                 Edge* e = intersection->reverse->next;
02335 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02336                 n = 0;
02337 #endif
02338                 while (e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot) <= 0)
02339                 {
02340 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02341                         n++;
02342 #endif
02343                         e = e->next;
02344                         if (e == intersection->reverse)
02345                         {
02346                                 return true;
02347                         }
02348 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02349                         b3Printf("Checking for outwards edge, current edge is ");
02350                         e->print();
02351                         b3Printf("\n");
02352 #endif
02353                 }
02354 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02355                 b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to check for complete containment\n", n);
02356 #endif
02357         }
02358         
02359         Edge* firstIntersection = NULL;
02360         Edge* faceEdge = NULL;
02361         Edge* firstFaceEdge = NULL;
02362 
02363 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02364         int m = 0;
02365 #endif
02366         while (true)
02367         {
02368 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02369                 m++;
02370 #endif
02371 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02372                 b3Printf("Intersecting edge is ");
02373                 intersection->print();
02374                 b3Printf("\n");
02375 #endif
02376                 if (cmp == 0)
02377                 {
02378                         Edge* e = intersection->reverse->next;
02379                         startEdge = e;
02380 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02381                         n = 0;
02382 #endif
02383                         while (true)
02384                         {
02385 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02386                                 n++;
02387 #endif
02388                                 if (e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot) >= 0)
02389                                 {
02390                                         break;
02391                                 }
02392                                 intersection = e->reverse;
02393                                 e = e->next;
02394                                 if (e == startEdge)
02395                                 {
02396                                         return true;
02397                                 }
02398                         }
02399 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02400                         b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to advance intersection\n", n);
02401 #endif
02402                 }
02403 
02404 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02405                 b3Printf("Advanced intersecting edge to ");
02406                 intersection->print();
02407                 b3Printf(", cmp = %d\n", cmp);
02408 #endif
02409 
02410                 if (!firstIntersection)
02411                 {
02412                         firstIntersection = intersection;
02413                 }
02414                 else if (intersection == firstIntersection)
02415                 {
02416                         break;
02417                 }
02418 
02419                 int prevCmp = cmp;
02420                 Edge* prevIntersection = intersection;
02421                 Edge* prevFaceEdge = faceEdge;
02422 
02423                 Edge* e = intersection->reverse;
02424 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02425                 n = 0;
02426 #endif
02427                 while (true)
02428                 {
02429 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02430                         n++;
02431 #endif
02432                         e = e->reverse->prev;
02433                         b3Assert(e != intersection->reverse);
02434                         cmp = e->target->dot(normal).compare(shiftedDot);
02435 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02436                         b3Printf("Testing edge ");
02437                         e->print();
02438                         b3Printf(" -> cmp = %d\n", cmp);
02439 #endif
02440                         if (cmp >= 0)
02441                         {
02442                                 intersection = e;
02443                                 break;
02444                         }
02445                 }
02446 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02447                 b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to find other intersection of face\n", n);
02448 #endif
02449 
02450                 if (cmp > 0)
02451                 {
02452                         Vertex* removed = intersection->target;
02453                         e = intersection->reverse;
02454                         if (e->prev == e)
02455                         {
02456                                 removed->edges = NULL;
02457                         }
02458                         else
02459                         {
02460                                 removed->edges = e->prev;
02461                                 e->prev->link(e->next);
02462                                 e->link(e);
02463                         }
02464 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02465                         b3Printf("1: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02466 #endif
02467                         
02468                         Point64 n0 = intersection->face->getNormal();
02469                         Point64 n1 = intersection->reverse->face->getNormal();
02470                         btInt64_t m00 = face->dir0.dot(n0);
02471                         btInt64_t m01 = face->dir1.dot(n0);
02472                         btInt64_t m10 = face->dir0.dot(n1);
02473                         btInt64_t m11 = face->dir1.dot(n1);
02474                         btInt64_t r0 = (intersection->face->origin - shiftedOrigin).dot(n0);
02475                         btInt64_t r1 = (intersection->reverse->face->origin - shiftedOrigin).dot(n1);
02476                         Int128 det = Int128::mul(m00, m11) - Int128::mul(m01, m10);
02477                         b3Assert(det.getSign() != 0);
02478                         Vertex* v = vertexPool.newObject();
02479                         v->point.index = -1;
02480                         v->copy = -1;
02481                         v->point128 = PointR128(Int128::mul(face->dir0.x * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.x * r1, m01)
02482                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.x * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.x * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.x,
02483                                                                                                                         Int128::mul(face->dir0.y * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.y * r1, m01)
02484                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.y * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.y * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.y,
02485                                                                                                                         Int128::mul(face->dir0.z * r0, m11) - Int128::mul(face->dir0.z * r1, m01)
02486                                                                                                                         + Int128::mul(face->dir1.z * r1, m00) - Int128::mul(face->dir1.z * r0, m10) + det * shiftedOrigin.z,
02487                                                                                                                         det);
02488                         v->point.x = (btInt32_t) v->point128.xvalue();
02489                         v->point.y = (btInt32_t) v->point128.yvalue();
02490                         v->point.z = (btInt32_t) v->point128.zvalue();
02491                         intersection->target = v;
02492                         v->edges = e;
02493 
02494                         stack.push_back(v);
02495                         stack.push_back(removed);
02496                         stack.push_back(NULL);
02497                 }
02498 
02499                 if (cmp || prevCmp || (prevIntersection->reverse->next->target != intersection->target))
02500                 {
02501                         faceEdge = newEdgePair(prevIntersection->target, intersection->target);
02502                         if (prevCmp == 0)
02503                         {
02504                                 faceEdge->link(prevIntersection->reverse->next);
02505                         }
02506                         if ((prevCmp == 0) || prevFaceEdge)
02507                         {
02508                                 prevIntersection->reverse->link(faceEdge);
02509                         }
02510                         if (cmp == 0)
02511                         {
02512                                 intersection->reverse->prev->link(faceEdge->reverse);
02513                         }
02514                         faceEdge->reverse->link(intersection->reverse);
02515                 }
02516                 else
02517                 {
02518                         faceEdge = prevIntersection->reverse->next;
02519                 }
02520 
02521                 if (prevFaceEdge)
02522                 {
02523                         if (prevCmp > 0)
02524                         {
02525                                 faceEdge->link(prevFaceEdge->reverse);
02526                         }
02527                         else if (faceEdge != prevFaceEdge->reverse)
02528                         {
02529                                 stack.push_back(prevFaceEdge->target);
02530                                 while (faceEdge->next != prevFaceEdge->reverse)
02531                                 {
02532                                         Vertex* removed = faceEdge->next->target;
02533                                         removeEdgePair(faceEdge->next);
02534                                         stack.push_back(removed);
02535 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02536                                         b3Printf("2: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02537 #endif
02538                                 }
02539                                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02540                         }
02541                 }
02542                 faceEdge->face = face;
02543                 faceEdge->reverse->face = intersection->face;
02544 
02545                 if (!firstFaceEdge)
02546                 {
02547                         firstFaceEdge = faceEdge;
02548                 }
02549         }
02550 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02551         b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to process all intersections\n", m);
02552 #endif
02553 
02554         if (cmp > 0)
02555         {
02556                 firstFaceEdge->reverse->target = faceEdge->target;
02557                 firstIntersection->reverse->link(firstFaceEdge);
02558                 firstFaceEdge->link(faceEdge->reverse);
02559         }
02560         else if (firstFaceEdge != faceEdge->reverse)
02561         {
02562                 stack.push_back(faceEdge->target);
02563                 while (firstFaceEdge->next != faceEdge->reverse)
02564                 {
02565                         Vertex* removed = firstFaceEdge->next->target;
02566                         removeEdgePair(firstFaceEdge->next);
02567                         stack.push_back(removed);
02568 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02569                         b3Printf("3: Removed part contains (%d %d %d)\n", removed->point.x, removed->point.y, removed->point.z);
02570 #endif
02571                 }
02572                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02573         }
02574 
02575         b3Assert(stack.size() > 0);
02576         vertexList = stack[0];
02577 
02578 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02579         b3Printf("Removing part\n");
02580 #endif
02581 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02582         n = 0;
02583 #endif
02584         int pos = 0;
02585         while (pos < stack.size())
02586         {
02587                 int end = stack.size();
02588                 while (pos < end)
02589                 {
02590                         Vertex* kept = stack[pos++];
02591 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02592                         kept->print();
02593 #endif
02594                         bool deeper = false;
02595                         Vertex* removed;
02596                         while ((removed = stack[pos++]) != NULL)
02597                         {
02598 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02599                                 n++;
02600 #endif
02601                                 kept->receiveNearbyFaces(removed);
02602                                 while (removed->edges)
02603                                 {
02604                                         if (!deeper)
02605                                         {
02606                                                 deeper = true;
02607                                                 stack.push_back(kept);
02608                                         }
02609                                         stack.push_back(removed->edges->target);
02610                                         removeEdgePair(removed->edges);
02611                                 }
02612                         }
02613                         if (deeper)
02614                         {
02615                                 stack.push_back(NULL);
02616                         }
02617                 }
02618         }
02619 #ifdef SHOW_ITERATIONS
02620         b3Printf("Needed %d iterations to remove part\n", n);
02621 #endif
02622 
02623         stack.resize(0);
02624         face->origin = shiftedOrigin;
02625 
02626         return true;
02627 }
02628 
02629 
02630 static int getVertexCopy(b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex* vertex, b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex*>& vertices)
02631 {
02632         int index = vertex->copy;
02633         if (index < 0)
02634         {
02635                 index = vertices.size();
02636                 vertex->copy = index;
02637                 vertices.push_back(vertex);
02638 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02639                 b3Printf("Vertex %d gets index *%d\n", vertex->point.index, index);
02640 #endif
02641         }
02642         return index;
02643 }
02644 
02645 b3Scalar b3ConvexHullComputer::compute(const void* coords, bool doubleCoords, int stride, int count, b3Scalar shrink, b3Scalar shrinkClamp)
02646 {
02647         if (count <= 0)
02648         {
02649                 vertices.clear();
02650                 edges.clear();
02651                 faces.clear();
02652                 return 0;
02653         }
02654 
02655         b3ConvexHullInternal hull;
02656         hull.compute(coords, doubleCoords, stride, count);
02657 
02658         b3Scalar shift = 0;
02659         if ((shrink > 0) && ((shift = hull.shrink(shrink, shrinkClamp)) < 0))
02660         {
02661                 vertices.clear();
02662                 edges.clear();
02663                 faces.clear();
02664                 return shift;
02665         }
02666 
02667         vertices.resize(0);
02668         edges.resize(0);
02669         faces.resize(0);
02670 
02671         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex*> oldVertices;
02672         getVertexCopy(hull.vertexList, oldVertices);
02673         int copied = 0;
02674         while (copied < oldVertices.size())
02675         {
02676                 b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex* v = oldVertices[copied];
02677                 vertices.push_back(hull.getCoordinates(v));
02678                 b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* firstEdge = v->edges;
02679                 if (firstEdge)
02680                 {
02681                         int firstCopy = -1;
02682                         int prevCopy = -1;
02683                         b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* e = firstEdge;
02684                         do
02685                         {
02686                                 if (e->copy < 0)
02687                                 {
02688                                         int s = edges.size();
02689                                         edges.push_back(Edge());
02690                                         edges.push_back(Edge());
02691                                         Edge* c = &edges[s];
02692                                         Edge* r = &edges[s + 1];
02693                                         e->copy = s;
02694                                         e->reverse->copy = s + 1;
02695                                         c->reverse = 1;
02696                                         r->reverse = -1;
02697                                         c->targetVertex = getVertexCopy(e->target, oldVertices);
02698                                         r->targetVertex = copied;
02699 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02700                                         b3Printf("      CREATE: Vertex *%d has edge to *%d\n", copied, c->getTargetVertex());
02701 #endif
02702                                 }
02703                                 if (prevCopy >= 0)
02704                                 {
02705                                         edges[e->copy].next = prevCopy - e->copy;
02706                                 }
02707                                 else
02708                                 {
02709                                         firstCopy = e->copy;
02710                                 }
02711                                 prevCopy = e->copy;
02712                                 e = e->next;
02713                         } while (e != firstEdge);
02714                         edges[firstCopy].next = prevCopy - firstCopy;
02715                 }
02716                 copied++;
02717         }
02718 
02719         for (int i = 0; i < copied; i++)
02720         {
02721                 b3ConvexHullInternal::Vertex* v = oldVertices[i];
02722                 b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* firstEdge = v->edges;
02723                 if (firstEdge)
02724                 {
02725                         b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* e = firstEdge;
02726                         do
02727                         {
02728                                 if (e->copy >= 0)
02729                                 {
02730 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02731                                         b3Printf("Vertex *%d has edge to *%d\n", i, edges[e->copy].getTargetVertex());
02732 #endif
02733                                         faces.push_back(e->copy);
02734                                         b3ConvexHullInternal::Edge* f = e;
02735                                         do
02736                                         {
02737 #ifdef DEBUG_CONVEX_HULL
02738                                                 b3Printf("   Face *%d\n", edges[f->copy].getTargetVertex());
02739 #endif
02740                                                 f->copy = -1;
02741                                                 f = f->reverse->prev;
02742                                         } while (f != e);
02743                                 }
02744                                 e = e->next;
02745                         } while (e != firstEdge);
02746                 }
02747         }
02748 
02749         return shift;
02750 }
